summary:
ad·vo·cate: a person who supports a particular cause:
men·tor: a person who gives a less experienced person help and advice over a period of time;
coach: a person who teaches a particular skill

If you would like some suggestions, feedback or support then feel free to reach out to me!

Highly experienced in IT startup and scaleup business coaching and founder mentoring with a focus on startups in data sciences and machine learning (AI). IT delivery and change management in the roles of mentor, business coach, senior project manager, (MSP certified) program manager, business manager, and change (transition/turnaround) manager with a passion for mentoring, coaching, and continuous improvement. Highly experienced in developing complex software solutions and improving software engineering processes. MSc (cum laude) in Computer Science and BSc in Applied Mathematics.

Operates from a results-based delivery management perspective. Extensive experience in managing delivery from an internationally based team across multiple continents. Highly experienced in Agile/Scrum (directly involved with over 70 sprints) acting in change management, product owner and ScrumMaster roles.

Worked for both global, international organizations (Atos Origin, Baker-Hughes, Digital, HCL, Mphasis, Philips, Shell) as well as SME's (Eyefreight, Plaxis) as well as (own) startups (InvestorCare, QA Systems,  Siennax-SaasPlaza). 

Customers included such international companies as ABN Amro, Campari, Citibank, Commercial Union, DHL, Ericsson, FloraHolland, Heineken, ING, KLM, KPN, Levi’s, Rabobank, Samba Bank (Saudi Arabia), Shell, Shinsei Bank (Japan) and Tata Steel. Industry experience includes civil engineering, financial services, logistics, and oil & gas.

A pragmatic hands-on approach combined with a sense of humor and the ability to place things in perspective gives the ability to build bridges and achieve results in organizations in a culturally sensitive way.  Highly experienced in combining value discovery, strategic orientation, strong delivery management expertise, change management, coaching, and strong relationship management.




.

projects.title: Successful Insourcing of a 15 person Dutch team into an international Indian outsourcing company.
projects.description: The assignment was to integrate a team of professionals into the company who would continue to provide the service support for a complex warehousing application that was being insourced at the same time.

profile_positions.description: FasterCapital is a virtual incubator based in Dubai Internet City. FasterCapital was established in 2010 and has graduated over 20 startups. FasterCapital is well connected worldwide with 1005 Representatives and Regional Partners and 492 offices and a network of 1026 Mentors worldwide. FasterCapital has established 150 partnerships with incubators/accelerators/VentureFunds worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Mentor

profile_positions.description: Acting as a startup mentor to a number of student startups as part of their Entrpreneurship program.
profile_positions.title: Startup Mentor

profile_positions.description: Business coach for a number of student startups as part of their Master's Program on Entrepreneurship.
profile_positions.title: Business Coach

profile_positions.description:
Mentoring IT startups with a focus on Data Science/Machine Learning
Rockstart launched in 2011 in Amsterdam as one of Europe’s first startup accelerators that supports and empowers the best startups across four domains: Energy, Health, AgriFood, and Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning. Rockstart provides startups with access to the capital, market, community, and domain expertise by connecting them to partners, investors and (technical) mentors. Since its inception, Rockstart has invested in more than 200 startups and supported them in their journey to raise €90 million and hire more than 700 people.
• Mentoring a number of AI startups in the areas of value propositions and market niches, internal processes, project management and desired startup culture.
profile_positions.title: AI Startup Mentor

profile_positions.description:
ARS Traffic & Transport Technology has been providing traffic and transport technology solutions to businesses and government bodies since 1997. The company is active in its home market of the Netherlands, but also internationally. ARS T&TT is an end-to-end provider from consultancy, design, development and operation to project finance.

• managing a complex project for the design and implementation of the Enterprise Architecture and Information Processing System supporting the Vehicle Traffic Services in the Scheldt area of the Scheldt Radar Chain which coordinates and guides the more than 100000 ships yearly entering the Westerschelde. The infographic gives a visual overview of the system https://www.scheepvaartbegeleiding.be/images/downloads/infografiek_SRK_NL.pdf.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Plaxis is the market leader for modeling software for complex geo-engineering problems across a range of civil engineering areas including tunnels, excavations, embankments and off-shore structures for both sustainable and hydrocarbon energy winning.  

For the scientifically inclined: Plaxis software solves problems represented by geological constitutive models based on non-linear partial differential equations using sophisticated computational mechanics algorithms (numerical solution methods for non-linear mechanics problems) providing intuitive modeling of complex geo-engineering phenomena.

This was a double role: managing customization projects, that is, specific customer requests falling outside the standard product and improving software engineering processes. A current project is, for example, improving the modelling of offshore wind turbine monopile foundations to allow for smaller foundations supporting the same load.
•	 formalized project management and introduced a project management framework
•	managed various Plaxis customization projects
•	designed and rolled out a time management model for the company and implemented in a Jira based time management system (Tempo)
•	implemented a Jira based portfolio management system providing a single system multilevel model starting from business initiatives right down to individual tasks
•	helped transition the organization to a scrum development model
•	introduced an ISO 25010 based quality assurance model
•	set up and advised on process and culture for a combined onshore/near shore team
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Software Engineering

profile_positions.description:
This was a follow-on assignment by the same business sponsor as by Baker-Hughes.
•	Set up an IT governance model for the Shell TaCIT (Technical and Competitive IT) organization based on the introduction of Enterprise Agile (DAD - Disciplined Agile Delivery)
•	developed an extendable, multi-layered enterprise process model using DAD for TaCIT using mind mapping technology
•	Acted as adviser of the project management team of Petrochemical Data Systems (a Shell IT supplier)  for a Shell subsurface modelling development project 
•	Set up an IT change strategy to introduce enterprise agile into TaCIT
•	Participated in Shell IT change management works streams for the initiation of the change activities. Developed the blueprint for the development organizational structure.
profile_positions.title: IT Process Change Manager

profile_positions.description:
Senior Project Manager delivering a high-end platform for geological and reservoir modeling in a 80 person joint development project between Shell and Baker Hughes. The assignment required establishing and executing a joint development project between BHI and Shell called Radiant. See http://www.shell.com/global/aboutshell/media/news-and-media-releases/2013/shell-and-baker-hughes-develop-innovative-reservoir-modelling-pl.html 

The platform brings enhanced evaluation and visualization capabilities to Shell allowing geoscience and petroleum engineering experts to better plan and manage the extraction of oil and gas resources, realizing their full potential. 
•	built the project from 30 to 80 people
•	established the project culture and inter-company cooperation model
•	designed and implemented the governance model
•	designed and implemented the knowledge management model
•	achieved a Shell first year IT project audit with a "no improvement required" rating - the first time this ever happened in Shell IT audit history. The project was also awarded a prize for inter-company co-operation.
•	established on time delivery
•	Publication:  Loose Coupling of Metadata and Actual Data in End-to-End Data Provenance (B. Rundle & R.Vuurboom) SPE Annual Technical Conference and Exhibition, 26-28 September 2016, Dubai

  

See http://www.bakerhughes.com/news-and-media/resources/baker-hughes-in-the-news/shell-and-baker-hughes-develop-reservoir-modelling
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed/expanded existing accounts.
•	Negotiated new contracts
•	(Re)negotiated existing contracts to improve terms and increase revenue

•	Directed company's project managers
•	Created ITIL framework for the company

•	Designed and rolled out a time management model for the company and implemented this in Tempo for Jira
profile_positions.title: Senior Relationship Manager/Senior Delivery Manager
